pullRequest.title: Create presto-hive-base package
pullRequest.bodyText:
presto-hive-base is intended to be shared among different packages
that use hive but does not necessarily depend on presto-hive.
We consolidated HiveErrorCode in this commit as the initial class.
== NO RELEASE NOTE ==

beforeCommit.message:
Create presto-hive-base package

presto-hive-base is intended to be shared among different packages
that use hive but does not necessarily depend on presto-hive.

We consolidated HiveErrorCode in this commit as the initial class.
